script_execution.description: Change directory to the working directory
Set the environment variable ML_DATA to the data directory
Add the current directory to the PYTHONPATH
Print the current date and time
Print a message indicating the execution of the script

script_execution.command: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=xRep0 python fixmatch.py --train_kimg xKimg0 --uratio xUratio0 --confidence xConf0 --wd xWd0 --wu 1  --batch xBatch0 --lr xLr0  --filters=32 --scales 3 --repeat 4 --dataset=cifar10.xSeed0@xSize0-xValid0 --train_dir experiments/fixmatch/SxSeed0@xSize0-xValid0IterxKimg0UxUratio0CxConf0WDxWd0BSxBatch0LRxLr0AxAug0_xRep0 --augment xAug0  > $PBS_O_WORKDIR/results/cifar10.xSeed0@xSize0-xValid0IterxKimg0UxUratio0CxConf0WDxWd0BSxBatch0LRxLr0AxAug0_xRep0 &
script_execution.description: Execute the fixmatch.py script with specific parameters and redirect output
Print a message indicating the execution of the script

script_execution.command: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=xRep1 python fixmatch.py --train_kimg xKimg0 --uratio xUratio0 --confidence xConf0 --wd xWd0 --wu 1  --batch xBatch0 --lr xLr0  --filters=32 --scales 3 --repeat 4 --dataset=cifar10.xSeed0@xSize0-xValid0 --train_dir experiments/fixmatch/SxSeed0@xSize0-xValid0IterxKimg0UxUratio0CxConf0WDxWd0BSxBatch0LRxLr0AxAug0_xRep1 --augment xAug0  > $PBS_O_WORKDIR/results/cifar10.xSeed0@xSize0-xValid0IterxKimg0UxUratio0CxConf0WDxWd0BSxBatch0LRxLr0AxAug0_xRep1
script_execution.description: Execute the fixmatch.py script with specific parameters and redirect output
Wait for all background processes to finish
Print the current date and time
